software.description:
CalaTK is an open-source toolkit for cross-sectional and longitudinal atlas building.

The CalaTK project develops innovative methods and tools for longitudinal atlases with a focus on neurodevelopment. The computational toolbox is developed with the objective to analyze the neural developmental patterns observed in human and non-human primate structural and diffusion tensor magnetic resonance (MR) images.
software.maintainer: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
